page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KERRIE.
page.content: When I woke up I got dressed, washed, cleaned my teeth and went for breakfast. I took the dog out for his morning walk before I went to call for my friend. We played '{sevens up}' while we waited for the school bus. At 9-15 school started with the register after which we did maths and handwriting. We then had playtime for 15 minutes. The rest of the morning was spent preparing items for the { {Domesday Project}. After my packed lunch and free time we prepared to practise{Maypole {Dancing }ready for the village fete. Following afternoon playtime we had recorder lessons. When I got home I made a cup of tea for my mum and went to play before tea time. We had {Toad in the Hole. I had a bath and watched '{Carry on {Doctor}' before going to bed at 9-00.
